info.title: Nexus REST API
info.description: Explore resources and get their data.

post.summary: Searches for the given resource paths and returns the corresponding catalog items.

get.summary: Gets a list of child catalog info for the provided parent catalog identifier.
Gets the specified catalog's time range.
Gets the license of the catalog if available.
Gets all attachments for the specified catalog.

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path to the resource data to stream.

get.summary: Gets the status of the specified job.

post.summary: Creates a new job which reloads all extensions and resets the resource catalog.
Clears the aggregation data cache for the specified period of time.

get.summary: Gets the list of package references.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the package reference to update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the package reference.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the package reference.

get.summary: Gets the list of source descriptions.
Gets the list of data source pipelines.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The optional user identifier. If not specified, the current user will be used.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The optional user identifier. If not specified, the current user will be used.

parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.description: The identifier of the pipeline to update.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The optional user identifier. If not specified, the current user will be used.

parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.description: The identifier of the pipeline to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The optional user identifier. If not specified, the current user will be used.

parameters.name: returnUrl
parameters.description: The URL to return after successful authentication.

parameters.name: returnUrl
parameters.description: The URL to return after logout.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The personal access token to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The optional user identifier. If not specified, the current user will be used.

requestBody.description: The personal access token to create.

parameters.name: tokenId
parameters.description: The identifier of the personal access token.

get.summary: Accepts the license of the specified catalog.
Gets the list of writer descriptions.

CatalogItem.description: A catalog item consists of a catalog, a resource and a representation.

parameters.description: The optional dictionary of representation parameters and its arguments.

ResourceCatalog.description: A catalog is a top level element and holds a list of resources.

Resource.description: A resource is part of a resource catalog and holds a list of representations.

Representation.description: A representation is part of a resource.

isReadable.description: A boolean which indicates if the catalog is accessible.

isWritable.description: A boolean which indicates if the catalog is editable.

isReleased.description: A boolean which indicates if the catalog is released.

isVisible.description: A boolean which indicates if the catalog is visible.

isOwner.description: A boolean which indicates if the catalog is owned by the current user.

types.description: An array of data source types.

infoUrls.description: An array of data source info URLs.

begin.description: The date/time of the first data in the catalog.

end.description: The date/time of the last data in the catalog.

groupMemberships.description: A list of groups the catalog is part of.

JobStatus.description: Describes the status of the job.

type.description: The writer type. If null, data will be read (and possibly cached) but not returned. This is useful for data pre-aggregation.

provider.description: The provider which loads the package.

configuration.description: The configuration of the package reference.

registrations.description: The list of pipeline elements (data source registrations).

releasePattern.description: An optional regular expressions pattern to select the catalogs to be released. By default, all catalogs will be released.

visibilityPattern.description: An optional regular expressions pattern to select the catalogs to be visible. By default, all catalogs will be visible.

type.description: The type of the data source.

resourceLocator.description: An optional URL which points to the data.

configuration.description: Configuration parameters for the instantiated source.

isAdmin.description: A boolean which indicates if the user is an administrator.

personalAccessTokens.description: A list of personal access tokens.

expires.description: The date/time when the token expires.

claims.description: The claims that will be part of the token.
